overview:
Alun Evans is CTO of BodyPal.com, a successful startup which supplies a Virtual Fitting Room for the fashion e-commerce world.

With a PhD and post-doc work in Image Processing, 3D Graphics and Virtual Character animation, Alun’s goals at BodyPal are to bring cutting edge technology to the e-commerce world.

He is also associate lecturer at Pompeu Fabra University, Barcelona, Spain, where he enjoys teaching the new generation of computer scientists in computer graphics and programming.
